name: Apex Executive Jet Center GOK
about: Apex Executive Jet Center at Guthrie/Edmond Regional Airport (GOK) is a premier aviation service provider dedicated to delivering exceptional quality and personalized service. Our team manages the airport, hangars, and other facilities to ensure a top-notch experience for all clients. We are equipped to handle a wide array of aircraft, including business jets, cargo operators, military aircraft, and general aviation. Utilizing newer equipment such as fuel trucks, ground power units, lav carts, and aircraft tugs, we ensure efficient and reliable operations. Our commitment is to anticipate and meet the needs of our clients, fostering strong relationships built on trust and excellence. At Apex Executive Jet Center, we are dedicated to providing outstanding service to every visitor.
